data.message: How do I verify my Page?

replies.message: Hi Usama. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1M3SfC3. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1KIMIvr. We hope this is what you're looking for! -Rey
